service.name: Configuration Database
service.tagline: Manage the configuration information of federated e-infrastructure assets and their functional relations
service.description: The Configuration Database is a central registry to record topology information about all the participating sites of your e-infrastructure. The Configuration Database also provides different rules and grouping mechanisms for filtering and managing the information associated to resources. This can include entities such as operations and resource centres, service endpoints and their downtimes, contact information and roles of staff responsible for operations at different levels. Main characteristics: ready-to-use solution for configuration management, improves the operation of a distributed infrastructure, hierarchical management with roles and capabilities.
service.targetUsers: EGI service providers, Infrastructure operators, service operators
service.userValue: Improves the operation of a distributed infrastructure.
service.funding: Development: EC H2020 projects (primarily) and national projects/open source projects. Operations: EGI participant fees + in-kind contribution from service providers
